medical_history.chief_complaint: Right lower quadrant pain accompanied by nausea and one episode of emesis.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began last night with nausea and one episode of vomiting. She had one loose bowel movement. There have been no fevers or chills, and no prior similar episodes in the past.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Cholelithiasis; past surgical history includes laparoscopic cholecystectomy years ago.
